amendment.description: Amendment eliminates $16.8 million appropriated for the Office of Territorial and International Affairs and its associated programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 11 as amendment No. 26, to eliminate the $3.5 million in funds appropriated for the Office of Insular Affairs, reduce assistance funds to U.S. territories by $13 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gallegly amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
